```{r}
library("dplyr")
load("parkinsons.rda")
d <- parkinsons
```


```{r}
d$sex[d$sex == "male"] <- 1
d$sex[d$sex == "female"] <- 2
d$sex <- as.numeric(d$sex)

summary(d)
plot(d)
```
